author: cbs8
title: First Edition of the Play Inside Expo - A New Family Event in Laval
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE Tourisme Laval
http://www.multivu.com/players/English/7660051-tourisme-laval-play-inside-expo/
LAVAL, QC , Oct. 20, 2015 /CNW Telbec/ - A presentation of CAA-Quebec Travel, the Play Inside Expo will be held at the Cosmodôme in Laval on November 7 and 8, 2015 from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. This free event will showcase the best of what the region has to offer in indoor activities. The Laval region is indeed renowned for the diversity and the quality of its various family-oriented indoor activities, from wall-climbing to glow-in-the-dark mini-golf to surfing and even parachute jumping simulation – all this year-round and within a radius of a few kilometres!
In November, a great number of parents are looking for stimulating indoor activities and entertainment, and Laval has a lot to offer. This first edition of the Play Inside Expo will provide the perfect opportunity to get out and enjoy some family fun while discovering new activities.
In all, there will be close to 20 exhibitors on site. Thrill-seekers will truly enjoy Escalade Clip'n Climb, Action 500 Karting and Paintball, Maeva Surf, SkyVenture, and Putting Edge to name just a few. Cultural enthusiasts will discover the Salle André-Mathieu programme. Foodies will fall in love with the Fromagerie du Vieux-Saint-François. Budding scientists will be quite excited to discover the offerings of Musée Armand-Frappier, a renowned bioscience interpretation centre, the C.I. EAU, Laval's water interpretation centre, and the Cosmodôme dedicated to space discovery and adventure.
The exhibitors will be offering on-site workshops, animation, conferences and demonstrations as well as over $1,500 in prizes. Plus visitors will be able to buy gift certificates, making the event the perfect place to start one's holiday shopping.
" Laval is assuredly a family destination thanks to the sheer number of unique family activities that are offered in such proximity to one another, which makes parents' job much easier when comes the time to find great things to do," says Geneviève Roy, President and CEO of Tourisme Laval.
She adds: "When we consider how close we are to Montreal and the Laurentians, Laval is essentially a big playground for a population of over 4 million people, and the best part is that we have something to offer to all of them."
The Play Inside Expo promises to be a new and exciting family event that will showcase Laval as a destination of choice for year-round creative fun and entertainment – an event not to be missed on November 7 and 8!
To learn more, visit: www.playinside.ca
Play Inside Expo
November 7 and 8, 2015
At the Cosmodôme
2150, autoroute des Laurentides (15)
Laval (Québec) H7T 2T8
From 10 a.m. to 5 p.m.
Free admission
